amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 115-679 to expand access to traditional foods for native populations first created in Sec. 4033 of PL 113-79.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 115-679 to expand access to traditional foods for native populations first created in Sec. 4033 of PL 113-79.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
